amendment.description: Amendment inserts language into the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act to include substance abuse treatment programs that provide alternatives to incarceration for pregnant women as eligible for family-based substance abuse treatment grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Donovan amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Donovan.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Donovan amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
